itunes:title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! -24
title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! -24
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Derek Weida is joined by Owen and special guest Sean Endsley to discuss how they met in the same Army platoon and what it was like coming into the army as an E4, he talks about his experience in SOPC, and the two recollect moments from their deployments ...
itunes:summary:
Derek Weida is joined by Owen and special guest Sean Endsley to discuss how they met in the same Army platoon and what it was like coming into the army as an E4, he talks about his experience in SOPC, and the two recollect moments from their deployments in Iraq.

 

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Derek Weida is joined by Owen and special guest Sean Endsley to discuss how they met in the same Army platoon and what it was like coming into the army as an E4, he talks about his experience in SOPC, and the two recollect moments from their deployments in Iraq.
